content.detailedDescription: At 9:45 pm est my husband was out on our deck when he saw two bright lights suddenly appear in the sky over our house.  these lights just appeared from nowhere as if someone had switched them on.  he called me outside and i saw two bright lights, quite large, pulsating red, orange, yellow and green (main colors were red and orange) travelling soundlessly across the sky in a northerly direction.  after about 30 seconds, the lights went out and the objects turned an opaque white color and were disc shaped.  as they moved across the horizon one appeared to become somewhat distorted, more elongated as if it was changing shape.  we lost sight of it as it passed over some trees and out of sight.   very strange and like nothing we've seen before.
content.summary: Two glowing lights in the sky that changed color and shape as they flew

content.detailedDescription: Have videos
content.summary: Have videos

content.detailedDescription: This incident occurred the following morning that i witnessed two simultaneous star-like light orbs descend in an arc-like fashion withi the same vicinity as this incident.  this sighting began when i got up and early in the morning for work.  it was still dark outside.  i went in the kitchen and turned on the dining room light as i entered our kitchen.  i did not turn on the kitchen light, as i allowed the background light from the dining room to illuminate the kitchen sink area where i stood.  i was getting ready to turn on the coffee maker when i noticed that it was incredibly dark outside.  i noticed that the street lamp that is within view from my kitchen window was off, as well as my carport light.  i wondered if the power had gone out and looked behind me to glance our the sliding glass door where the downtown area was illuminated.  we live on a hill.  i then realized that the power had not gone off because i had the dining room light on.  as i looked out the window directly above the kitchen sink where i stood, i noticed a single column of light shining across the street.  my first thought was that our neighbor left his garage door open because it was an different type of lighting, like a synthetic cool-white fluorescent light and not warm in shade tone.  i realized that based on where the light was coming down, this tall block of light could not have been a garage door because our houses are not spaced directly across from one another, but adjacent.  my direct view is to see in between my two neighbor's houses.  this made me feel very strange, as though i had vertigo, as i thought about this realization.  i stared continuously at this light and did not move.  i suddenly had the urge to look at the time on the oven display, which read 4:44.  i looked at the light again and said quietly to myself, "what is that?"  i felt the need to just stand and stare.  because of the window and blue oak tree in our front yard, i could not see where the light was actually eminating from.  i do know that the trees within the light were not fluttering about as though a helicopter was shining a spotlight.  it was silent outside.  the light did not move at all.  i felt like i could not look away and actually was unsure how long i actually stood there.  i am assuming no longer than five minutes.  as i stretched my neck forward close to the window and looked up toward the left to find the street lamp, i suddenly saw the light slowly turn back on.  i glanced back toward the center of my view and noticed that our carport light was back on as well and the column of light was gone.  i was stunned.  i later thought that it was very odd that i didn't have the urge during that whole time to grab my camera.  i didn't want to do anything except stare at it.  i never saw what was actually projecting the light.  i only saw the column of light and this is very odd because there are no lights or motion lights there.  it was coming from above, anyway, directly in between the space of two houses...No more and no less.  the largest wintu settlement of california  lived directly under our hill.  thousands were intentionally poisoned by kit carson (a pioneer) during a settlement many years ago. a "friendship feast."   i know the whole area is spiritually charged.  there are are also large power line towers up here in our neighborhood.
content.summary: Only a stationary beam of light was observed, in between the space of two houses across the street. i was unable to see a craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out onto my driveway around 6 pm to meet my husband as he got home.  it was october so it was already dark at this time of year.  i was walking out to explain to him that i had been unable to use his truck all day because it would die after i would start it and then place it in drive.  as i approached the street to attempt turning on the truck again, my husband walked past me into the house to put his things away.  i glanced up at the end of my driveway and noticed two whitish-yellowish solid light orbs, that i assumed were stars at the time, falling in an arc-like fashion.  they reminded me of the size of head lights from where i was standing.  they remained equal distances from one another and appeared to be going exactly the same speed and direction.  they made no noise and fell into a canyon, possibly behind the back yards of my neighbors who live across the street.  i immediately thought to myself,"wow, that's strange...Two shooting stars, one right after the other" and felt myself not give this too much thought.  although afterward, i realized that i this was not possible.  there are a few very large power line towers in this vicinity.  this occurred directly in front of me toward the direction that i was walking and the arc-like descent lasted approximately 3-4 seconds.  it did not flicker.  the lights appeared exactly the same and they moved as though they were attached, yet i could not see anything but sky around each of them.  it was a clear night.  this incident did not strike me as that odd until the incident that occurred the following early morning, which i will enter next on a separate submission.  i am entering these incidences only now because i was told about the website last night and urged to document them.  thank you for reading them.  this sight is very interesting and detailed!
content.summary: Observed two whitish lights, equal distance, fall in an arc behind trees which made no noise and looked like head lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way home, and i noticed the lights cause they didn't move. they stayed same distance appart. we are couple miles from an airport,  but lights were different. i wasn't sure exactly what it was.
the lights were red-orange, there were 3 in a pyramid shape, and they stayed stationary in the sky. didn't blink or anything.  i was really surprised to begin and even joked and posted on facebook i saw 3 ufos, but am really surprised a lady showed me the article saying that 2 people saw a ufo.
we continued home and didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Thought i saw a ufo, lights high n the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of pure eatery, preparing to go inside for dj gig.  i looked above the building across the street and observed two stationary, dual red lights.  about 30 seconds after noticing it, it moved across the sky and came to a stationary position nearly above me.  i began filming the object, which made no sound.  as i filmed the object, several other people on the crowded street took notice.  i filmed the object for two minutes and then stopped filming.  i looked down for a second and when looked back at it, the color had changed from red to green.  i began filming again and it suddenly made its way swiftly across the sky, until it went out of view behind the buildings.  i stopped filming and about 30 seconds later, a helicopter flew across the sky rapidly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dual red light, changing to dual green lights

content.detailedDescription: This was a very short visitation of sightings. at approximately 11pm i noticed 2 flashes of light, side by side, up in the middle of the "dipper" part of ursa major. three minutes later, witness b observed a flashing light (star) just to the left and outside of the area that i did except this star craft was surrounded by a reddish light. each sighting lasted a second... if that.
content.summary: Flashing lights inthe night sky

content.detailedDescription:
While at the great lakes naval training facility and attending boot camp, i saw what i am about to describe in nov. of 1966. 
while standing outside around 5:30 am, in line for the chow hall, i was looking up at the sky which was very clear and it seemed like a lot of stars were out. 
i noticed what seemed to be a meteorite going from my right to my left, and as my eyes shifted to follow it, it wasn't there. i shifted my eyes back to the area to my right and noticed what looked like a slightly brighter star in the area that i had last seen the meteor. i was just looking at that when it went off across the sky to my left at an amazing speed and stopped in an instant. i said something about it to a few of the closest guys to me, and they looked up in the area where it was. then it went from left to right about the same distance it had gone from right to left, but was further away from where i first observed it. it stayed in place for a short period, and then came back to near the first place i saw it. then it went up, like a meteor going in a reverse direction, until it was out of sight. 
 what i observed made like an elongated triangle, made four stops, traveled at an amazing speed, and could stop in an instant. the stops may have been for app. 4-5 sec. each, and what i observed was probably around 30 sec., give or take a second or two. 
i didn't report it at the time! figured i would still be locked up in a padded cell, or they would have thought i was trying to get out of the service. 
 one interesting thing i found out later in a readers digest article: there was supposedly a team of ufo experts at that facility when i was there.?? 
i don't know what i saw that morning, but i don't think it was ours!
content.summary: Object in sky looked like a merior falling, made a triangular pattern, and went back up into space.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two friends (we were all 18 to 19 years old) had been camping nearby. we took a late night walk to the side of a river. we were standing in a line a few feet apart on  rocks at the side of the river. there were large electricity pylons about 500 yds from the other side of the river. it had been almost pitch dark and we needed torches to walk through a wood to reach the riverbank. suddenly it was like daylight and we looked up. we saw a large (approx. 150ft across) glowing, white spherical object approach us from the north west. it hovered towards us and stopped about 70-100 ft above/in front of us. there was a very faint buzz. it stayed there for about ten minutes as we looked up in disbelief, mouths open, unable to speak. we glanced at each other but could not talk. at some point in the middle of this we observed 4 small white objects come off the main object and disappear. they emerged from the object at the 3,6,9 & 12 o'clock positions all at the same time.  the object then moved slowly to the west for about 300 yards. it stopped for a few seconds and then accelerated to the south so fast, that it disappeared in about 8-10 seconds. it must have been doing 100,000 mph? i had often seen military jets flying over very low, in the area doing 1000 mph+, but this was something else entirely and i knew it was definitely not of this world.

we told a few people at the time but they laughed and ridiculed us so we stopped talking about it. i have lost touch with the other two people and have only told my wife, parents and a couple of friends since then.

i now live about one mile up river from the site as i have always been drawn to this area. i do not have clear memories of abduction but i often get the feeling that i have been abducted on a regular basis and often wake up exhausted with mysterious pains for no apparent reason. i often feel a "presence" in buildings and rooms around the house and have done, for years in previous homes as well. i am very sensitive to these things and sometimes stop in my tracks and take a different route instinctively. i have found that i am very good at psychometry.
content.summary: Hovered above, very close for about 10 mins, 4

content.detailedDescription: Our observation of the ufo disc took place in  patricksburg indiana, at my friends house, in the front yard, on a saturday afternoon around 1315-1400 hours, september 1966, with a clear sky. talking with my friends, i looked south and saw a black object coming our way. i knew it was a flying craft but could not id the type of craft until about 1000' out. it was flying low passing over the treetops in a straight south to north heading. as it passed by, it was about 100' out, 200' altitude, no markings or windows, all black, and the only sound i could hear was the turbulence from the wind. its size was around 100' by 25'. as it continued north over the woods, we lost sight of the craft. just as we lost sight of the ufo, we turned back south and saw two military jet fighters on the same course following the ufo. as the two f-4 fighters, flying in line passed by, they were so close, i saw the pilot turn his head and look right at us. we knew about ufos according to comic books and tv, but this was the first time we actually saw one and my thoughts were, its just a military project. looking back in history and time, knowing a little about the military and the governments of the world, its obvious we  communicate with these aliens as we described them, aliens of the universe and underworld.
content.summary: Black disc, 100' wide, traveling from south to north, treetop high, 100 feet north.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving.  stopped at a traffic light in a very busy intersection on highway.  my passenger said: do you see that!!!  i said no i have to watch the traffic (not knowing what he was referring to).  he said once you get past the intersection pull off.  i did but it was not safe being a highway with a narrow shoulder.  i looked at where he was pointing and was amazed at what we saw.  i only got a quick look at it because i had to continue on.  what i saw was: a very large object that appeared flat and rectangular, silvery almost transparent.  what he saw was: a very large spherical/oval shape, silvery with several lights that emerged and flew about the larger object.  when i was able to glance at it again it was at that time it suddenly disappeared or became invisible.  we were both excited, awed and felt "wow, there are ufo's" which means there are others out there.  we then drove home and talked about it a lot but didn't report it or anything.

the next day i was driving to work and on the radio a listener tuned in to ask the broadcasters if "anyone saw what i saw over tsawwassen yesterday morning?  i don't know what it was but it was huge."  the radio then went silent for about 30 seconds, then music came on.  i continued to listen but there was no further mention of that question or occurrence.

we both have had small incidences of sightings after that, mostly while camping; but one other "incident" happened while we were living up north.

it was a fall night, totally clear sky and we were admiring how beautiful and plentiful the stars were.  my friend pointed out a slow moving object.  i said satellite, he said no, watch, it changed direction, stopped (hovered) and sped up.  he watched it for a while.  i glanced around looking at the moon admiring how beautiful and clear it was in the night sky when suddenly a very solid beam of light shot out from the moon to a distant object (star?).  i exclaimed oh my god.  my friend looked over and saw what i saw.  the beam was straight, white like a light bulb and solid and considering the distance it was large.  it eventually retracted.  while we stood there talking about how amazing that was, like, "beam me up scotty", it happened again but this time it shot out and retracted almost instantly.  

i have no doubt there are things that exist we know nothing about but maybe one day we will.
content.summary: Travelling home on secondary highway, saw huge silvery object with several

content.detailedDescription:
1. front yard ,playing with my soccer ball.

2.The shape was huvering over the tree's

3. a balloon

4.The ufo hovered over the house and then started to get lower and lower towards the roof of my house which is my grandmothers and then i'll started waving at it and doing more and tried to do morse code. trying to say hi then it went up once hovered and a lot like a bolt of lightning it was gone.
content.summary: Amazing and cool

content.detailedDescription: At 9:20pm a friend and i observe a star like craft in the western sky. i observed it appearing first then i exclaimed to my friend to "look up". we both observed this star craft move slowly and arc across the sky towards the north. it moved slowly at first even slowing down and/or stopping while hovering in the sky. it almost appeared to dance a bit in the fixed position but then would stop and begin moving again slowly towards the north of the "ghost ranch" outside of abiquiu. it seemed to go almost due north and set between two other star crafts in the sky looking like three crafts in a row. the three stars hung in the sky but eventually dimmed out completely and couldn't be seen any longer.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A star craft appears in the west, brightens, changes direction and moves northward

content.detailedDescription: At the coast, roughly 9:45 pm looking east/southeast about 100 degrees to a compass and 55-45 degrees in the sky, a moving light caught my attention. i watched a reddish orange round dime size light seemingly just above low light cloud cover. the light was moving steady and unwavering due east. the light was moving much slower than a meteor and much faster than an aircraft or jet. i watched the light for 8-10 seconds and there was no sound. the light was not bright or dim but was easy to see. the night was calm and no wind. the clouds were thin enough to see a couple of stars. the light disappeared toward the horizon where a two story house on the beach obstructed my view. the light could be described as similar to a small harvest moon moving fast and low across the sky to the east. two others at the pool area about 30 yards away from me also witnessed the moving light and similarly described.
content.summary: Reddish orange round dime size light just above clouds moving slower than meteor, and faster than aircraft observed 8-10 seconds. two others [removed/cms/jpg] wittnessed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side with my dog, its a beautiful day, im watching the plains go by and i noticed what i thought was a big bird with a shiny object circling around it, it looked to be far away. i watched it cross the sky for about 10 min with this thing going around it. i thought it was weird as other planes were going by, and this object was much slower.After it had traveled 3 quarters of the way across the sky it stopped. and stayed in position for about 8 minutes. it seemed like it was going up as i could not see the shiny object any longer. i lost sight of it after a neibour ask about my dog. i tryed to get her to see the object but it was so small but looked like it hadent moved thats why i think it was going up.
content.summary: Object appeared to have anothe object circling around it, slowly traveled across the sky then stoped,stationary for almost 10 min then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: It was long an silver an dit had fire rocket inthe the back of the ship.
content.summary: I was sitting in the back yard when i saw the sliver space fly bye and i told everbody look a ufo the y said it was not but it was

content.detailedDescription:
We were at home in stony plain, alberta, watching the baseball game; houston vs toronto at about 11:02am.  when camera pans to the cn tower from the rogers centre, and there is the object streaking across the tv screen.  
   thought at first it was a bug.  played it back a few times and realized it could be something more. all we could make out was a white streak. then its gone.
   took a video of the event by rewinding the pvr and playing it through to the event.  
   the object went off screen.  couldn't follow it. moved way to fast to be any bug.  illuminated craft.

thank you,
ew
content.summary: White object moving extremely fast.  if you blink you miss it.

content.detailedDescription:
My then partner and i were awoken by a brilliant, pure white light, apparently projected toward our house from a southerly direction. the light was painful to look at, but was stationary, with no attendant sounds, as would be expected from a helicopter or similar. as the light was already there when awoken, i would not know how long it lasted, but we observed it for some 10 to 15 minutes. it then abruptly extinguished. afew minutes after, a metallic scraping could be heard, as in someone dragging an old metal gate or door shut. this sound lasted only 3 or 4 seconds, but repeated identically several times more, but the noise was receding into the distance, and climbing at the same time. there was absolute silence apart from this. my partner commented that the light had appeared again two or three nights later, but i did not observe it myself.
we were mystified by this occurence, and i felt a bit aprehensive for a few days, but not in a serious way.
it was forgotten, as my partner and i split up shortly after this event, and it is only with the realisation that what was experienced that night does not make much sense that i felt it time to add to the evidence pile!
content.summary: A brilliant, pure white light projected toward the house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sat in the kitchen one evening when i noticed a light out of the corner of my eye,i went outside for a better look,to my amazement there hovering about house height 30 ft away was an orange/yellow orb,i immediately ran to get digital camera,when i went back outside it started doing very strange flying up down left right then came back to hoover in same place,i lifted camera and camera shut down which i found odd as they were new batteries,then a police helicopter appeared right next to it with red and blue lights flashing,the ufo went nuts,it flew in a way that no aircraft made by man could ever do,up sharp rights and lefts in such a way and at such speed that i immediately knew it was not from this planet as any human would have been killed if they were in it,it then went straight for the police helicopter which took evasive action on the orb would have crashed into it,it then shot of towards the gower.

the next day i bought new batteries just in case it came back,and at 22.32pm that night it did,but this time it was ten feet of the ground above my back garden i grabbed camera but again it powered off,the orb stayed still for about 5mins then shot straight up gone from my sight.
content.summary: Orange orb flying above house,shut down my digital camera also observed by police helicopter which had to move out of orbs erratic manoeuvres or would have collided with it.

content.detailedDescription:
I am from tonapah nv. nevada test site area 51.  now i've seen things you couldn't explain
a crater like object with blue and red blinking lights it had a dome like ship come out of the top
and flew away like magic poof gone as to my knowledge many people around the world had 
seen the same thing. now i'm in california and i have several pictures of the sun etc. during
the day but it looks like it was taken at night and also no clouds insight but it showed amazing
colors and shapes of pictures of dragons unicorns and an angel holding the sun and also have a picture of god in the clouds followed with an x now the only way it could be seen is by the phone not by your eyes etc. all my pictures and videos are on another phone and currently not hooked up. they really are a must see kind of thing. so with all that being said i can say it to all be true.
content.summary: Was taking a picture of the moon when it was on the east side seen a bright light above it i videotaped it and have a witness it wouldn't let me tape it till the endu could see it in the airbut not on the phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my police cruiser facing south and speaking to another officer who was facing north. i looked over his car and saw 5 red orbs in a v formation over the ocean. i first believed it to be a plane but then realized that they were hovering. i told the other officer to look but he was impeded by his position. the orbs then sped away southbound faster then any aircraft i believe could. i lost sight due to a building obstructing my view. i thought about reporting it and did not, thinking people would be skeptical. i didn't see any sightings after that. i have rarely spoken of the incident since and cannot pinpoint an exact time or date (i have since retired and would have to research police records to narrow down the time frame). i was working patrol on the barrier island section of our town at the time in the 90's. i have always wondered if anyone else had similar sightings around that time and location. your recent broadcasts have brought back my discussing it again.
content.summary: 5 red orbs hovered over the ocean in a v formation and then headed south at extremely fast speed disappearing from sight.

content.detailedDescription: Starlike object with possible beacon.  object would drop below the distant tree line then raise and hover again.  object was white with possible green and red beacon.  witnessed on fri june 5th 2015 11:00 pm also on thurs june 5th same time.  could be distant helicopter but it seems as though the altitude drop is very strange, and not sure why it would return to the same position every time.  not sure of total duration.  went to bed thinking it was a star being affected by "marsh gas" or an atmospheric condition.  this property was owned by my great grandparents, and my grandmother used to tell stories of seeing lights in that direction.  i have lived here for about 10 years and have never noticed it before. tried to record it on my phone, but could not get the phone video to see it.  i will look again tonight, sat june 6.  i will try to record with video camera and tripod for stability.  location of object is in southeastern adams co. wi.  possibly above the area of hancock wi.  or west of oxford wi. approx. 2-10mi from my location.
content.summary: Off to the north west star like object that looked like airplane but would dip below the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a lawn chair while the my dog was going about his business nearby and north of where i was sitting. while sitting there i began checking out the sky and that is when i noticed one aspirin sized, bright star west of my position flickering. i used my samsung 4 to take a picture of the star in the sky but didn't look at the finished photo until just recently when i enlarged it. that is when i saw craft nr. 1 and craft nr. 2 off to the first object. neither craft made any sound that i could determine as well as very little movement while i watched them and when nr. 1 did i was  thinking my eyes were playing tricks on me. i watched for about 2 or 3-minutes then i took the dog into the house. i do know when they left.

i have had no fear whenever i've sighted these craft other than when i was abducted at the age of 12. even then i actually was in awe of the craft and it's occupants. it was my friend who was with me who was frightened and that was due to him seeing my body lighting up and his seeing it like i was being x-rayed. he later apologized for his having taken off running; which he didn't as it was much later upon their releasing us that we took off as fast as we could high tail it. 

still i don't believe they meant to harm us in any way - just wanted to examine us and we most likely would do the same if we were in their shoes. i believe since i haven't kept accurate records of my sightings number 14 or more. i have been fortunate since i have been able to photograph and videotape most every sighting other than three of my fourteen or more different craft. on those three occasions two were sighted when i didn't have a camera with me and one other craft screwed up my droid camera by causing all the photos to turn out with nothing other than solid red coloring. i am uploading an original shot of the two craft together and then enlargements of craft nr. 1 and craft nr. 2.
content.summary: Two different type craft hovering with slight movement and glowing

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a bike ride along highways 13 and 325 north from rifle to above rifle gap reservoir.  stopped to take a photo of rifle gap from just below the reservoir using nexus 5 smartphone.  upon viewing the photo after the ride noticed the image in the photo.  uncertain that it is anything other than airplane so hoped you have digital analyzing software that will enable you to determine identity.

don't know if it has any significance but i had a premonition before starting the ride that i would see an ufo which i thought quite strange.
content.summary: Object was unnoticed until photo taken was viewed at a later date.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch which faces west one evening in late summer of 2014. it was dark out already. looking out i saw a light shoot down in a spiral path. the spiral path was more noticeable as it got closer (say about 50 ft. away from me)(kind of like a cork screw path). it was no bigger than an inch in the center where it looked like nothing but white light and from this center light is light that shoots out like you have a condensed version of a sparkler. it came within 1 1/2 ft. -2 ft. from my porch screen therefore i was approx. 7 ft. away from this light source as it hovered there for approx. 5 seconds and just took/shot off to the wsw direction.
i was confused after it left yet i never took my eyes off it the whole time i could see it. after thinking about it for 2 seconds i knew it was an orb i had seen. then i couldn't wait to call my mom and tell her about it along with a few select friends. 
not long after that what i thought was a dream wasn't all a dream. i was in my bed and i couldn't move. i was trying to sit up and couldn't. i looked at the end of my bed and there was this entity standing there. its to crazy to talk about the rest.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Small, bright, orb approached from the west, came to within 8 feet of the witness, hovered, and then quickly moved off to the southwest.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a wedding reception in front royal, va., when i stopped to take a picture of the sunset. after taking two pictures , i got in my car to drive home to strasburg. after  looking at the pictures i took at the reception , i noticed an object in the sunset pictures. as i have an  intwrest in ufo's i thought i would contact mufon.
content.summary: While takiing a picture of a sunset i observed the ufo  and took a picture of it.

content.detailedDescription: I was out that day trying to observe some sort of astronomical phenomenon (i do not remember which),just when i thought that the time for observing it has finished and that i arrived late,i saw a brightly glowing light about the size of a golfball moving high above in the sky.I thought it was the astronomical phenomenon i wanted to observe at first but i only realised my mistake when it moved.Then i thought that it was a plane but it was too slow for a plane.It as mentioned before, moved with a slow pace and it also had a golden aura which surrounded it.Though it was almost the same color as this strange egg-shaped object,it can be distinguished if observed keenly.I spotted the object in the west,and as i was observing i felt a sense of incompleteness,vagueness,ambiguity,curiosity,and a strange feeling which is indescribable.I also felt a sense of being observed as i watched it.I also felt like some sort of intelligencee was reading my mind.It faded away into the distance as i watched it with the same slow pace i described before.
content.summary: Shiny oval mass about the size of an airplane, but it emitted no red lights.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of window saw a large object moving north east. it was moving pretty fast had yellow ,white and red lights on the bottom. watched it for about one minute. no sounds. it was solid.
content.summary: Saw a large object moving ne it had yellow and red lights on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of walmart going to my car, when i noticed two very bright star-like objects low on the horizon. i put my groceries into the backseat of my car and stared at them for a minute. another gentleman noticed me and started checking them out also. i told him that at first that i thought the lower of the two objects was venus because it was so bright. but i knew that venus was in the eastern sky,which i pointed to him. he agreed, shook his head and proceeded into the store. i got into my car and drove to my next destination about a mile away. once getting out of my car i saw that the two objects were now about a mile further away. on my way home,i was driving towards the objects and they were getting closer as i drove towards them. i turned right and once i got in front of the walmart they seemed to be less than a quarter-mile away. i had to get back home because it was not my car and my nephew needed it. so i was heading north and saw that i was again driving away from the objects. after making several turns heading towards the house i became disoriented about what direction i was going.At this time i could not see the objects because of the treeline. once i was on my home street, i saw straight ahead of me a bright light moving towards me.I immediately drove into my driveway and ran in to tell my brother and nephew that something was coming towards the house. they laughed but proceeded to follow me outside. once on the porch, we saw a low-flying milatery chamophag helicopter with a bright light on the front of it go by just above the treeline. i asked my brother is it headed south, he replied yes. i told him that was the direction the objects were. i then told him what i had saw.They both laughed at me thinking i am crazy. even once we all thought it was unusual that a military helicopter would be flying that low at that time of night.I used to have a telescope when i was back in omaha where i came from eight months earlier. i know alot about night skies and i know that you cannot drive away from or towards them.I know that if i had the time to check them out further i believe that i could have drove right underneath those objects and would be able to describe them better.
content.summary: Saw two very bright star-like objects low in the horizon, that did not move.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my computer facing a large picture window that has a panoramic view of lake washington. i see planes coming in from the east to the small boeing airport several times a day so i am aware of flight paths.  suddenly there was this object directly over our house heading east at a rapid speed, it was disc shaped with lights all round it, a very light green and white lights in 2 rows, the green being above the white lights.  to the south was a small plane landing at boeing field, the object appeared to be flying in the same path as the plane although as i said it was over our house whereas the plane was to the south several blocks over.  the object subsequently disappeared, as though it flew into clouds, but the night sky is clear.  it simply disappeared.

it took me several seconds to realize that i was seeing something out of the ordinary, the object was very clear and bright, the shape very distinguishable.  i know this was no plane or helicopter, there is no flight path over our house, and i see enough of both planes and helicopters day and night to know the difference.  i think the thing that brought me out of my confusion was the fact that there was no noise coming from the object, it flew directly over our house and the lights were so unusual in color and pattern. 

i chose to send this to you because i have read about your organization and i felt it needed to be reported.
content.summary: Moved over our house heading east until it simply disappeared
